version_description:
• Enabled multiple-lease and multiple-property support. If you rent from multiple properties, you will be able to select which property to view and which lease to pay.
• Added functionality to complete move-in and maintenance inspections through the app.
• Fixed reported login issues. If you are still having trouble, please contact us at rpapp@entrata.com.
• Resolved unresponsiveness affecting iPhone 5s devices.
• Credit balance will now show in the app (If allowed by property).
• Fixed some reported bugs and crashes.

• Improved Touch ID experience
• Added the ability to change property via the menu if applicable
• Improved login failure messaging
• Fixed all reported bugs

• Improved Touch ID experience on login
• Added the ability to identify property by address
• Crash fixes
• Fixed all reported bugs

• You can now see your last payment and future scheduled charges from the dashboard
• View MoneyGram account information and locations closest to you
• Those who live at communities that only accept payments or only accept maintenance requests and not payments will now be able to use the app
• You can now provide feedback at any time by selecting the ‘Provide App Feedback’ link in the menu
• Added spelling suggestions for commonly mistyped email addresses
• Cosmetic changes
• Resolved known issues

• You can now see your last payment and future scheduled charges from the dashboard
• View MoneyGram account information and locations closest to you
• Those who live at communities that only accept payments or only accept maintenance requests and not payments will now be able to use the app
• You can now provide feedback at any time by selecting the ‘Provide App Feedback’ link in the menu
• Added spelling suggestions for commonly mistyped email addresses
• Cosmetic changes
• Resolved known issues

• You can now add emergency contacts
• You can now remove properties from the list to choose from when logging in if you've lived at multiple properties
• Added a 'Done' button above the keyboard to close the keyboard
• No longer stopping background audio playback when app opens
• Resolved known issues

• You can now add vehicles
• Improved user experience
• View office hours from maintenance screen
• If applicable, view money gram account information from stored billing screen
• Resolved known issues

• Improved user experience
• Resolved known issues

• Now view balance details from the dashboard
• Fixed UI issues on iPad devices
• Now shows confirmation payment id after submitting payment
• UI enhancements
• Fixed known issues

• Will now show payment ID on the payment confirmation page for future reference
• Can now enter a payment note when submitting a payment
• Can now view maintenance request notes from property staff
• Resolved known issues
•  Resolved issue with messages section for some users of iPhone 7 and 7 plus.
•  Enhanced user experience

• Fixed known issues.
• Improved UI in some areas.

• Control your smart thermostat, lights and door locks right from the app for Entrata SmartProperty enabled units.
• Now select your unit on login instead of when making a payment or submitting work order if applicable.
• Now allowed to enter other payment amounts if property allows.
• User interface enhancements.
• Fixed known issues.

• Emergency contacts improvements.
• User interface enhancements.
• Fixed known issues.

• Users at Guest Manager enabled properties can now add guests and set one time or recurring access schedules
• Home Controls will now appear on the Dashboard for Smart Property enabled users
• Can now delete vehicles
• Miscellaneous user experience improvements

Fixed known issues
Minor user interface enhancements

• Added Face ID support for iPhone X
• Added ability to change password
• Improved forgot password workflow
• Added leasing office hours to contact screen
• Now shows nearby properties during sign up
• User interface improvements
• Resolved known issues

• Can now indicate if guests are allowed to pick up packages on your behalf
• Can now easily add another maintenance request after submitting one
• Miscellaneous user interface enhancements
• Reduced app size to take up less space on phone
• Resolved known issues

• UI is now optimized for iPhone X
• Can now enable Maintenance Push Notifications
• Can now add a nickname to any stored billing method
• Resolved known issues

• Added new contact preference options
• Added payment method nicknames to Payment History and Auto Payments
• Improved user experience
• Fixed known issues

• Can now view smart water sensors and plugs on the Home Controls dashboard for Entratamation enabled units.
• Can now receive push notifications for a smart thermostat and water sensors for Entratamation enabled units.
• Fixed known issues.
• Improved user experience.

• Various user experience improvements.
• Fixed known issues.

• Added scenes capability for home automation enabled units
• Various user experience improvements
• Fixed known issues

• Various user experience improvements.
• Fixed known issues.

• Can now setup bimonthly auto payments for properties that allow it.
• Can now split auto payment between roommates.
• Improved user experience.
• Fixed known issues.

• A more helpful description is shown when a payment method is not available to use.
• New MoneyGram account creation workflow.
• Can now view door code for smart units.
• Various user experience improvements.
• Fixed known issues.

• Can now view list of active guests associated with a smart lock.
• Can now view guest door codes.
• Can now share door codes with guests via text message.
• Fixed known issues.
• Improved user experience.

• Can now share door codes with guests via text message for smart units.
• Fixed known issues.
• Improved user experience.
Minor improvements and bug fixes

• Fixed known issues.
• Improved user experience.

• Fixed known issues.
• Improved user experience.

• Added Community Access features for applicable Entratamation enabled properties.
• Bug fixes and permission updates.

• Can now view smart water sensors and plugs on the Home Controls dashboard for Entratamation enabled units.
• Can now receive push notifications for a smart thermostat and water sensors for Entratamation enabled units.
• Fixed known issues.
• Improved user experience.

• Entratamation users can now see their Entratamation activity.
• Bug fixes

• Major release with all new look and feel.
• Can now reserve amenities.
• Added support for other languages, including Spanish, French and Chinese.
Bug fix release with known issues resolved.

• Improved Alerts text
• Updated Auto-Payments to support installment plans
• Added Pending Payments section to the Ledger
• Added Guest List under My Apartment
• Added Rentable Items under My Apartment
• Made several accessibility updates
• Fixed various known bugs and crashes

• Several accessibility enhancements including additional VoiceOver support and resolved color contrast issues
• Various user interface enhancements
• Fixed several bugs with submitting maintenance requests
• Other minor bug fixes

• Various accessibility updates including fixes to contrast ratios and new announcements
• Updates to Inspection e-signing
• Updates to date picker for Amenity Reservations
• Updates to language availability to match property preferences
• Other bug fixes

• Can now view property events
• Improvements to app accessibility
• Improvements to Inbox messages for enhanced readability
• Haptic feedback added to the Smart Home section
• Updates to Guest Managers Schedule
• Various UI enhancements
• Resolved known issues
Fixed known issues

May now view property announcements
New Community Dashboard with quick links to key areas of the app
Added support for bank account linking for easier eCheck payments
Maintenance requests now show Created On and Completed On dates
Various UI enhancements
Resolved known issues
Resolved known issues

• Added ability to request renewal offer, in Contact Property area
• Added ability to view and create classified ads
• Enhancements to payment support in Canada
• Improvements to app alerts
• Resolved issue where notification badges were not removing
• Various UI enhancements
• Resolved other known issues

• Added ability to request renewal offer, in Contact Property area
• Added ability to view and create classified ads
• Enhancements to payment support in Canada
• Improvements to app alerts
• Resolved issue where notification badges were not removing
• Various UI enhancements
• Resolved other known issues

• Added ability to view and upload documents
• Added new color to ledger items, indicating hyperlinks to additional information
• Added swipe (left) to delete message functionality
• Added support for 30 minute amenity reservations, if applicable to your property
• Added 'Pending Approval' message on events awaiting property approval
• Various UI enhancements
• Resolved known issues
Resolved known issues

• Added support for enhanced property services
• Added 'Needs Action' tab to Documents module
• Added ability to see and update emergency contacts
• Added emergency maintenance request message, if applicable to your property
• Various UI enhancements
• Resolved known issues

• Added support for new alerts for lease signing, document signing, renewals, property reviews, and move-in/move-outs
• Added support for vehicles
• Added support for tax display in balance details and ledger, when applicable
• Added support for badging with pending alerts and messages
• Added new alert for document uploads that require further action
• Added push notification for downloaded documents
• Various UI enhancements
• Fixed known issues

• Added Move-In Scheduler and Move-In Checklist to facilitate the move-in process
• Added Move-Out checklist to facilitate the move-out process
• Can now provide forwarding/alternate mailing address in profile when moving out
• UI enhancements
• Bug fixes

• Added Accessibility Statement under app Settings module
• Added Email and Phone options when messaging seller, for Classifieds
• Added "Pending Property Approval" indicator to amenity reservations, when applicable
• Added mobile number workflow for SMS opt-in
• Added Payment Summary screen for one-time payments
• Added photo requirement for failed Inspection items
• Added "Refund Account" area to Payments module
• Added "Request Transfer" workflow, similar to web portal
• UI Enhancements
• Resolved known issues

• Added support for "Dark Mode" option
• Added support for maintenance and other property surveys
• Added OCR card scanning support for refund accounts
• Updates to bank account verification workflow
• Various UI enhancements
• Fixed known issues

• Added Club module and functionality
• Added optional "Company Name" and "Notes" fields to Emergency Contacts
• Added optional "Setup Auto-Payment" button to one-time payment confirmation screen
• Added emergency dialogue box when maintenance requests are entered with "Emergency" priority
• Various UI enhancements
• Fixed known issues
